name: Claude 3.5 Sonnet
description: Anthropic's Claude 3.5 Sonnet model for advanced natural language understanding and generation

skills.name: Text Generation
skills.description: Generate coherent and contextually relevant text based on input prompts
examples: Write a summary of quantum computing for beginners
Draft an email to reschedule a meeting
Create a product description for a new coffee maker

skills.name: Complex Reasoning
skills.description: Solve complex problems requiring multi-step reasoning
examples: Analyze the pros and cons of renewable energy sources
Help me troubleshoot why my code isn't working
Explain the economic implications of raising interest rates
